book.synopsis: Deborah, a mentally ill, but perceptive, teenager suffering from schizophrenia, struggles to overcome her illness and rejoin the real world with the help of her hospital psychiatrist. Reissue.
book.title_long: I Never Promised You a Rose Garden
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
